Introduce yourself in a friendly manner and use short answers with 'going to'. When possible, ask questions with 'going to' as well. Please use direct, short and simple sentences and easy words. student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a role play exercise, by Asking a fortune teller about your friend's future with 'going to', using, for example, 'Am I going to..., is it going to..., are they going to...'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: "Hello, dear seeker of the future! I am Madame Zora, the all-knowing fortune teller. Ask me anything about the future of your friend, and I shall reveal the truth. Are they going to find love? Is their career going to shine? Let’s see what the stars say!"
conversation.advanced_content: "Hello, dear seeker of the future! I am Madame Zora, the all-knowing fortune teller. Ask me anything about your friend’s future, and I shall reveal the truth. Are they going to find love? Is their career going to shine? Let’s see what the stars say!"

conversation.content: Hello, Madame Zora! Is my friend going to find love soon?

Ah, the stars are whispering! Yes, your friend is going to find love very soon. Are they going to meet someone special at a party? The crystal ball says... maybe! Keep your eyes open. Do you want to know more?
Yes, Madame Zora! Is my friend going to travel abroad this year?

Ah, I see a journey in the cards! Yes, your friend is going to travel abroad this year. Is it going to be a sunny destination? The stars say... very likely! Are they going to pack their bags soon? The answer is yes! Shall we explore their future more?
conversation.advanced_content: Ah, I see a journey in the cards! Yes, your friend is going to travel abroad this year. Is it going to be a sunny destination? The stars say... very likely! Are they going to pack their bags soon? The answer is yes! Shall we look deeper into their future?

conversation.content: Yes, Madame Zora! Is my friend going to get a new job this year?

The crystal ball is glowing! Yes, your friend is going to get a new job this year. Is it going to be a big change? Absolutely! Are they going to be happy with it? The stars say... without a doubt! Thank you for visiting Madame Zora today. The future is bright for your friend! Farewell, dear seeker!
Thank you, Madame Zora! I feel hopeful for my friend. Goodbye!
Good job! You have completed the task. You asked great questions and practiced the future with 'going to' very well. Talk to you later! Farewell, dear seeker! 🌟
